title: Change in kinetic energy of cart from graph

content.question: A cart is moving on a level track in the positive x-direction. A force acting parallel to the x-axis is exerted on the cart. The graph above shows the net force exerted on the cart as a function of displacement. As the cart travels from x = 0 m to x = 4 m , what is the net change in the kinetic energy of the cart?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
